summary: The self-driving car is traveling through a tunnel at night. Initially, the car is moving at 23 km/h. As the car progresses, several individuals become visible within the tunnel. At 4.3s, a male on a bicycle, wearing a white shirt and dark pants, appears on the right side of the road. At 5.2s, a male wearing a white shirt and dark pants is kneeling in the middle of the road. At 6.1s, the car decelerates to 7 km/h. At 7.0s, the car is almost stopped, and at 7.8s, the car is stopped. The male kneeling in the middle of the road is now very close to the car.

characters.behavior: riding on the right side of the road
kneeling in the middle of the road
walking on the left side of the road
walking on the left side of the road
walking on the left side of the road

actions: The vehicle is initially traveling at 23 km/h. As the vehicle approaches the group of people in the tunnel, the driver decelerates to 22 km/h at 2.6s, then to 21 km/h at 3.5s, and further to 17 km/h at 5.2s. The driver is slowing down due to the presence of people in the tunnel and the reduced visibility. The vehicle decelerates further to 7 km/h at 6.1s and comes to a complete stop at 7.8s to avoid hitting the person kneeling in the middle of the road.
key_objects: Middle: A male kneeling in the middle of the road, approximately 2 meters away, posing an immediate collision risk.
Right side: A male on a bicycle, approximately 10 meters away, approaching from the right side of the road.
